Causes The Jailer to be selected twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.

addons.name: Dried Horsemeat
addons.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.
Extends the duration of a Hunt by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Treated Blade
addons.description:
Durkos Malecek stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.
Causes The Assassin to be selected twice in a row while cycling through Guardia Compagnia.

addons.name: Broken Hilt
addons.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.
Survivors damaged by a Guard suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Chain Mail Fragment
addons.description:
Downtime was spent repairing their armour, to avoid being on the receiving end of a fatal blow.
Survivors damaged by a Guard suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

addons.name: Grim Iron Mask
addons.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia.Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.
Survivors detected by a Guard during the Patrol Phase suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Ironworker's Tongs
addons.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 20 seconds, if a Guard fails to damage them during a Hunt.

addons.name: Town Watch's Torch
addons.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds, if Guards fail to damage a Survivor during two consecutive Hunts.

addons.name: Blacksmith's Hammer
addons.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.
Survivors escaping a Hunt by any means other than grabbing the Standard suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect and a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Flint and Steel
addons.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon.Fear was often their greatest ally.
Summoning The Carnifex causes the Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of dropped but unbroken Pallets to be revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Healing Poultice
addons.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.
Summoning The Assassin causes all Survivors within 24 metres of his Spawn location to scream and reveal their location for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Lightweight Greaves
addons.description:
Sometimes he wore lighter armour, letting him move faster; he knew nothing could stop him anyway.
Summoning The Jailer increases your Movement speed by +10 % for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Company Banner
addons.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves 'civilised' ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.
Blocks all Windows you pass through while drawing the Patrol Path to all Survivors for 15 seconds after summoning a Guard.
Blocks all Windows vaulted by the Hunted Survivor to all other Survivors for the remained of the Hunt.
Blocks the Exit Gates to the Hunted Survivor for the duration of the Hunt.
"They huddle in their villages like parasites! They have lost the drive for power." — Tarhos Kovács

addons.name: Knight's Contract
addons.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio's employ.The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.
Every fourth summon of a Guard causes all Survivors within 12 metres of his Spawn location to suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 8 seconds.
"I fear he has left me here to die." — Vittorio Toscano

addons.name: Cereal Rations
addons.description:
Contains 100 % of the recommended daily intake of Vitamin A.Tastes awful.
The Auras of deployed Remote Flame Turrets are revealed to you while inside the Tunnels.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds after emerging from the Tunnels.

addons.name: Drinking Bird
addons.description:
One of the many tchotchkes littering the Nostromo's living quarters.A bit of whimsy in an otherwise sterile environment.
Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after exiting the Tunnels by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Ovomorph
addons.description:
It looks harmless, but the horrors held inside are immeasurable.
Increases the Recovery speed of Crawler Mode when outside of the Tunnels by +25 %.

addons.name: Ripley's Watch
addons.description:
On a ship as massive as the Nostromo, synchronising watches was important to keep track of work shifts.
Causes the Remote Flame Turret to self-destruct after knocking you out of Crawler Mode.

addons.name: Ash's Innards
addons.description:
While hardier, mechanical beings break too when enough force is applied.
Increases the Respawn timer of Remote Flame Turrets by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Brett's Cap
addons.description:
This Nostromo ballcap was fashionable, but severely limited his vertical field of vision.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 25 seconds, when they were within 16 metres of a Remote Flame Turret that was destroyed by any means.

addons.name: Crew Headset
addons.description:
While they facilitated team communication, the constant chatter made the crew easier to track.
Increases the Detection range of Survivor Footsteps when inside the Tunnels by +6 metres.

addons.name: Lambert's Star Map
addons.description:
Vital for interstellar travel, but not as useful on a smaller scale.
Reduces the Flame-throwing range of Remote Flame Turrets by -2 metres.

addons.name: Light Wand
addons.description:
A portable light source used by Ash and Dallas while looking for the invasive creature.Mostly ineffective for lighting larger spaces.
Increases the Downtime duration of Remote Flame Turrets after exiting the Tunnels by +1 second.

addons.name: Emergency Helmet
addons.description:
An extra helmet on the bridge, for use in emergencies only.
Increases the Stagger resistance against Remote Flame Turret by +35 %.

addons.name: Kane's Helmet
addons.description:
A thin layer of glass was the difference between a minor inconvenience and the tragic destruction of the Nostromo's crew.
Survivors hit with a successful Tail Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Moulted Skin
addons.description:
The Xenomorph moulted many times as it rapidly grew on the Nostromo.Its shed skin was a constant reminder of its presence.
After deploying a Remote Flame Turret, Survivors suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect and the Exhausted Status Effect for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Multipurpose Hatchet
addons.description:
Equally useful for destruction and repair.
Survivors hit with a successful Tail Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

addons.name: Parker's Headband
addons.description:
A bold fashion choice that doubled as a handy way to wick sweat from the eyes.
Grants a +5 %  Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds after exiting the Tunnels.

addons.name: Cat Carrier
addons.description:
Saving the cat is a noble goal.It's also very distracting.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds, when a Remote Flame Turret knocks you out of Crawler Mode.

addons.name: Harpoon Gun
addons.description:
Barely a weapon, its use is only viable in a situation of last resort.
Successfully hitting a Survivor within 10 seconds after exiting the Tunnels causes all other Survivors farther than 24 metres from your location to scream and reveal their location to you.

addons.name: Self-Destruct Bolt
addons.description:
They needed to be removed to start, and replaced to end, the self-destruct sequence.Just seeing them evokes a sense of urgency.
Increases the Vaulting speed while in Crawler Mode by +30 %.

addons.name: Semiotic Keyboard
addons.description:
Its symbols are designed to be universally recognisable, but they may take some getting used to.
Reveals the Repair progression of Generators located within 16 metres of a Remote Flame Turret via the intensity of their Aura.

addons.name: Acidic Blood
addons.description:
When damaged, The Xenomorph's unique physiology made it deadlier than ever.
When Survivors stun you within 20 seconds after emerging from the Tunnels and while you are in Crawler Mode, the following effects apply:
Causes healthy Survivors to lose 1 Health State.
Causes injured Survivors to suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

"I think we oughta discuss the bonus situation." — Parker

addons.name: Improvised Cattle Prod
addons.description:
A brutal and noisy weapon, which might have been more effective against a cow.
Each time a Generator is completed, the following effect applies for 15 seconds:
The Auras of Survivors coming within 10 metres of a Control Station are revealed to you for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Amanita Toxin
addons.description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.It numbs the mind.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Bandaged Haft
addons.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -10 %.

addons.name: Coarse Stone
addons.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
Increases the volume of Grunts of Pain of injured Survivors hit by Hatchets by +50 %.

addons.name: Yellowed Cloth
addons.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +10 %.

addons.name: Leather Loop
addons.description:
The right tool in the right hands is key to a successful hunt.
Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Manna Grass Braid
addons.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -8 %.

addons.name: Oak Haft
addons.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -20 %.

addons.name: Shiny Pin
addons.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
Increases the Movement speed while winding Hatchets up by +5 %.

addons.name: Weighted Head
addons.description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.

addons.name: Deerskin Gloves
addons.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
Reduces the Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

addons.name: Flower Babushka
addons.description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -12 %.

addons.name: Rose Root
addons.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +20 %.

addons.name: Rusty Head
addons.description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Venomous Concoction
addons.description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Begrimed Head
addons.description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.

addons.name: Glowing Concoction
addons.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Infantry Belt
addons.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.He was quick in combat, but she was quicker.
Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +3 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Wooden Fox
addons.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect after reloading at Lockers for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Head
addons.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
Reduces the number of carried Hatchets to 1.
This number cannot be modified by other Add-ons.
"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

addons.name: Soldier's Puttee
addons.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s while out of Hatchets.

addons.name: Combat Straps
addons.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
Increases the Transition speed into the Crouched State by +10 %.

addons.name: Interlocking Razor
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
While injured, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become afflicted by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

addons.name: John's Medical File
addons.description:
The medical file of a cancerous man.Fills the reader with dread and recklessness.
Increases your Movement speed by +10 % when Crouched.

addons.name: Shattered Syringe
addons.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -10 %.

addons.name: Face Mask
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer permanently from the Blindness Status Effect.

addons.name: Last Will
addons.description:
A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will.
Increases your Movement speed during the Ambush Dash Attack by +6 %.
Increases the Charge time of the Ambush Dash Attack by +33 %.

addons.name: Razor Wires
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
While healthy, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become injured.
Increases the Skill Check difficulty by +20 %.

addons.name: Utility Blades
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect whenever they are injured by any means.

addons.name: Workshop Grease
addons.description:
A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -10 %.
Increases the Charge speed of the Ambush Dash Attack by +50 %.

addons.name: Bag of Gears
addons.description:
A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps.
Increases the Attachment speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
Reduces the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -14 %.

addons.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
addons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
Increases the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by +10 seconds.
Reduces the Death timer of all Active Reverse Bear Traps by -10 seconds each time a Generator is completed.

addons.name: Rules Set No.2
addons.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
Disables the ability of Survivors to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes, until their Reverse Bear Trap becomes active.
"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw

addons.name: Rusty Attachments
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Slow-Release Toxin
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort.
Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer permanently from the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Amanda's Secret
addons.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification and have their Auras revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Crate of Gears
addons.description:
This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install.
Increases the Attach speed of Reverse Bear Traps by +50 %.
Reduces the Search speed of Jigsaw Boxes by -25 %.

addons.name: Jigsaw's Sketch
addons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
The Auras of Generators being repaired by Survivors wearing a Reverse Bear Traps are highlighted to you in yellow.

addons.name: Tampered Timer
addons.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
Reduces the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by -20 seconds.

addons.name: Amanda's Letter
addons.description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.Fills the reader with rage and focus.
The Auras of Survivors within 16 metres are revealed to you when Crouched.
Reduces the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by -2.
"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Detective Hoffman

addons.name: Video Tape
addons.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
All Survivors start the Trial with a Reverse Bear Trap attached to them.

addons.name: "Philly"
addons.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.The film inside captured his last night in the city.
Reduces the Time to mark Survivors by -20 %.
"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Cheap Cologne
addons.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.Reserved for impromptu visits.
Increases the duration of Marked by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Headline Cut-Outs
addons.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
Increases your Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

addons.name: Walleye's Matchbook
addons.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville.A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
Reduces the Recovery time of Night Shroud by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Cinch Straps
addons.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
Causes Night Shroud to remain active on missed Basic Attacks.

addons.name: Marked Map
addons.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Address Book
addons.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
The Auras of Marked Survivors performing rushed actions are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Journal
addons.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Telephoto Lens
addons.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after revealing you.

addons.name: Chewed Pen
addons.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.Incriminating evidence that was never found.
Increases the Reveal time for Survivors in the Dying State to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Knife Belt Clip
addons.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -12 metres when Crouched.

addons.name: Lasting Perfume
addons.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
Increases the Reveal time for Survivors on a Hook to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Leather Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
Increases your Movement Speed by +10 % when Crouched.

addons.name: Olsen's Wallet
addons.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
Instantly recharges Night Shroud after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.

addons.name: Driver's License
addons.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity: Danny Johnson.
Causes Generators to explode and lose -20 % of its maximum possible Progression, when marking a Survivor repairing it, and blocks it for 15 seconds.
This penalty is only once if multiple repairing Survivors are marked.
"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is: who is next?" — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
Grants a +10 %  Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking a Survivors.
"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Night Vision Monocular
addons.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds after revealing you.

addons.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
addons.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking them.
"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
addons.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
Instantly recharges Night Shroud after putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack.
"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

addons.name: Outdoor Security Camera
addons.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 7 seconds after putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State.
"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Black Heart
addons.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to hit Survivors by -10 %.

addons.name: Rat Liver
addons.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
Increases your Movement speed while holding Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

addons.name: Rat Tail
addons.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +50 %.

addons.name: Rotten Pumpkin
addons.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
Causes the Portal from which you start your Teleport to seal automatically.
Grants +200 bonus Bloodpoints for Interdimensional Travel Score Events.

addons.name: Barb's Glasses
addons.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to break Breakable Walls or Pallets by -10 %.

addons.name: Mews' Guts
addons.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
Reduces the Attack cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.
Increases the number of available Portals by +1.

addons.name: Rotten Green Tripe
addons.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
Increases your Teleportation speed by +15 %.

addons.name: Sticky Lining
addons.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +2.5 metres.

addons.name: Viscous Webbing
addons.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +16 %.

addons.name: Brass Case Lighter
addons.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect while closing Portals.
This effect lingers for 60 seconds.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Deer Lung
addons.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
Increases your Teleportation speed by +30 %.
Reduces the number of available Portals by -2.

addons.name: Eleven's Soda
addons.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
The Auras of Generators actively being repaired by Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

addons.name: Thorny Vines
addons.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +1 metre.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +11 %.

addons.name: Violet Waxcap
addons.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +1 second.

addons.name: Lifeguard Whistle
addons.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
Survivors entering the Area of Effect of an active Portal automatically trigger Killer Instinct.
Reduces the Area of Effect of active Portals by -1 metre.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Unknown Egg
addons.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
Reduces the Recovery time of Of the Abyss by -2.5 seconds.
"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Upside Down Resin
addons.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.
Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +40 %.
"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Vermilion Webcap
addons.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +3 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Leprose Lichen
addons.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you while traversing the Upside Down.
This effect lingers for 3 seconds for all Survivors within 16 metres of an active Portal.
"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Red Moss
addons.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +8 seconds.
Suppresses all noise made while emerging from Portals.
Increases the time to emerge from Portals by +15 %.
"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Doll Eyes
addons.description:
One of the advantages of possessing a mass-produced doll is easy access to replacement parts.
When in Hidey-Ho Mode, the Auras of all Windows and downed Pallets are revealed to you within 20 metres.

addons.name: Good Guy Box
addons.description:
Someone kept this box around in case they needed to bring Chucky back to the store.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of successful Slice & Dice Attacks to 93 % of their default duration.

addons.name: Strobing Light
addons.description:
With the right training, it can be used to make people more suggestible.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres, when Hidey-Ho Mode is on cool-down.

addons.name: Tiny Scalpel
addons.description:
Sometimes, a precision cut can lead to a beautiful bleed.
When in Hidey-Ho Mode, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.

addons.name: Automatic Screwdriver
addons.description:
A good way to make mechanical adjustments on the fly.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -10 % after missing a Slice & Dice Attack.

addons.name: Electric Carving Knife
addons.description:
The annoying buzzing sound means it is ready to carve some flesh.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Slice & Dice Attacks to 95 % of their default duration.

addons.name: Hair Spray & Candle
addons.description:
An aerosolised inferno that will ensure a bad hair day is the least of your worries.
Reduces the Power-Gauge penalty of Basic Attacks when in Hidey-Ho Mode by -20 %.

addons.name: Jump Rope
addons.description:
Good for a bit of exercise, or for tying up your target.
Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 108 % of its default duration.

addons.name: Power Drill
addons.description:
Comes with a dozen convenient drill tips.They all make a big mess when applied to people.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -15 % after successful Slice & Dice Attacks.

addons.name: Portable TV
addons.description:
Small enough for any room.Just keep it out of the bath.
Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 170 % of its default duration once the Exit Gates have been powered.

addons.name: Rat Poison
addons.description:
The secret ingredient in a killer chilli.
While performing a Slice & Dice Attack, the Auras of all Survivors within 12 metres of you are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Running Shoes
addons.description:
The latest in high-performance killer doll athletic technology.
Performing a Scamper grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Silk Pillow
addons.description:
For when you want to smother your target with silky-smooth softness.
Permanently reduces your Terror Radius by -6 metres.
Increases the Charge time of Slice & Dice to 150 % of its default duration.

addons.name: Yardstick
addons.description:
Good for measuring distance.Even better for laying down a beating.
Performing a Scamper reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 12 metres of you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Mirror Shards
addons.description:
A bunch of shattered mirror pieces that reflect light and shadow, further disorienting the already disoriented.
Grants the ability to see the Illusory Footfalls around Survivors.

addons.name: Pile of Nails
addons.description:
It is a lot easier to stay hidden when your target is worried about a pile of nails flying at their head.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 5 seconds after manually ending Hidey-Ho Mode.

addons.name: Plastic Bag
addons.description:
Nothing tires out a kill like a lack of oxygen.
Survivors walking through an Illusory Footfall suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Straight Razor
addons.description:
For when a close shave needs to be really, really close.
Survivors hit with successful Slice & Dice Attacks suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.

addons.name: Hard Hat
addons.description:
Keeps the dome intact while performing high-impact activities
Instantly breaks Pallets when performing a Scamper under them.
Automatically ends Hidey-Ho Mode.
"A true classic never goes out of style." — Chucky

addons.name: Iridescent Amulet
addons.description:
A pendant of great power, recreated within the Realm.
Extends the duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by +50 %.
Basic Attacks immediately end Hidey-Ho Mode.
"If I don't get out of this body soon, I'm screwed." — Chucky

addons.name: Broken Security Key
addons.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship's equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.
Reduces the Reboot timer of disabled Biopods by -15 %.

addons.name: Heavy Water
addons.description:
A by-product of the micro-fission reactors powering cryo and life support.Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.
Reduces the Aura-reveal range of Supply Cases by -8 metres.

addons.name: Kid's Ball Glove
addons.description:
A kid's baseball glove owned by one of the colonists.His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.
Extends the duration of Overclock Mode by +15 %.

addons.name: Nutritional Slurry
addons.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.
Increases the number of carried Biopods by +2.

addons.name: Android Arm
addons.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made its extermination of humans easier, it also gave it more parts to work with.
Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.

addons.name: Cremated Remains
addons.description:
After extracting the other colonists' DNA, he burned their remains.
Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.

addons.name: Cryo Gel
addons.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.
Increases the Spreading rate of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)
addons.description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects.Intended to help with repair.
Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 60 seconds, when hit with a Basic Attack during Overclock Mode.

addons.name: Ultrasonic Sensor
addons.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum.Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.
Grants the ability to hear sounds through a controlled Biopod after 0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Hologram Generator
addons.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after you teleport to them from a Biopod.

addons.name: Hyperawareness Spray
addons.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus.Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.
Causes Slipstreamed Survivors to hear a fake Terror Radius.

addons.name: Live Wires
addons.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.
Causes Survivors to scream and interrupt their current interaction after removing Temporal Slipstream.

addons.name: Nanomachine Gel
addons.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly.However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.
Survivors suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds when hit with a Basic Attack during Overclock Mode.

addons.name: Spent Oxygen Tank
addons.description:
Without air to breathe, organics do not last long.
Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Crew Manifest
addons.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.
The Auras of newly Slipstreamed Survivors are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
Increases the range within which Temporal Slipstream can spread between Survivors by +2 metres.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)
addons.description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds after picking up an EMP.

addons.name: Foreign Plant Fibres
addons.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.
Reduces the duration of your Movement Speed penalty by +20 % when stunned by a Pallet during Overclock Mode.

addons.name: Soma Family Photo
addons.description:
A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.
Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect during Overclock Mode.
Reduces the duration of Overclock Mode by -20 %.
"YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS." — HUX-A7-13

addons.name: Denied Requisition Form
addons.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Temporal Slipstream.
Increases the maximum Printing time of the first batch of EMPs at the start of the Trial by +30 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard
addons.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave it sentience.
The Auras of Survivors within 6 metres of newly created Biopods are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"HELLO WORLD." — HUX-A7-13

addons.name: Modified Ammo Belt
addons.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Rickety Chain
addons.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
Grants +50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
Increases the Break-Free speed of Survivors from The Redeemer by +33 %.

addons.name: Snake Oil
addons.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.Purported to cure all that ails you.
Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +5 %.

addons.name: Spit Polish Rag
addons.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Chewing Tobacco
addons.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.Stimulates the nervous system.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Jaw Smasher
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases your Movement speed by +1.5 % during Aim Down Sights.
"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Marshal's Badge
addons.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres during Aim Down Sights.
"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Poison Oak Leaves
addons.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Spike
addons.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
Speared Survivors hit with the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
addons.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +9 %.
"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Honey Locust Thorn
addons.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
Speared Survivors breaking free from the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Tin Oil Can
addons.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Wanted Poster
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.It brings back burning desire for revenge.
Increases your Movement speed by +3 % during Aim Down Sights.
"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Warden's Keys
addons.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.35 seconds.

addons.name: Barbed Wire
addons.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +3.5 seconds.
"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Bayshore's Cigar
addons.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.
"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
addons.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
Reduces your Terror Radius by -8 metres during Aim Down Sights.
"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

addons.name: Prison Chain
addons.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
Increases the Break-Free time of Survivors from The Redeemer by +10 %.
"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

addons.name: Hellshire Iron
addons.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
This effect lingers for 10 seconds.
"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

addons.name: Iridescent Coin
addons.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while speared by The Redeemer, if shot from at least 12 metres away.
"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

addons.name: Caffeine Tablets
addons.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
The Auras of locked Lockers are highlighted to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

addons.name: Follower's Cowl
addons.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
Returning to the Remnant triggers Killer Instinct during Daytime.

addons.name: Mortar and Pestle
addons.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
You emerge from the Remnant facing your direction at the moment of Teleportation, rather than the one in which you had placed the Remnant.

addons.name: Wooden Plank
addons.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Air Freshener
addons.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
Increases the number of available Power Tokens to 4.

addons.name: Burnt Letters
addons.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Fallen Shingle
addons.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

addons.name: Haddie's Calendar
addons.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
Reduces the Exiting time of locked Lockers by -1 second.

addons.name: Malthinker's Skull
addons.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

addons.name: Broken Doll
addons.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.None of them were spared.
Increases the duration of Nightfall by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Destroyed Pillow
addons.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Ottomarian Writing
addons.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Daytime.

addons.name: War Helmet
addons.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Worry Stone
addons.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
The Auras of Survivors locking a Locker are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Boat Key
addons.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
Increases your Teleportation speed during Daytime by +25 %.
Causes all active Locks on Lockers to break once the Exit Gates are powered by any means.

addons.name: Field Recorder
addons.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
Causes the Trial to start in Nightfall.
Causes Nightfall to activate automatically once the last Generator is completed.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds after coming into contact with the Remnant.

addons.name: Lavalier Microphone
addons.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds after consuming the last Power Token.
Causes all Lockers within 6 metres of Survivors to open and slam their doors when entering them through teleporation.

addons.name: Tilling Blade
addons.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage,  and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds after becoming injured during Nightfall.
"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
addons.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the last 12 seconds of Nightfall.
"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Sacrificial Knife
addons.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
Blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of the Locker you emerge from for 5 seconds.
"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Black Strap
addons.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +0.5 metres.

addons.name: Copper Ring
addons.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +1 second.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

addons.name: Dead Butterfly
addons.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Lead Ring
addons.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Cinderella Music Box
addons.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +15 seconds.

addons.name: Forgotten Videotape
addons.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
addons.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +0.5 seconds.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

addons.name: Spearhead
addons.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear.It is flaked with blood from its last victim.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Wax Doll
addons.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +1 metre.

addons.name: Burning Man Painting
addons.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
Increases the reach of Punishment of the Damned Attacks by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Mannequin Foot
addons.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
Increases the duration of Torment Trails in the environment by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
addons.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1 second.

addons.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
addons.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
Increases the duration of Rites of Judgement by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
addons.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods.Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
Reduces the Recovery time of Rites of Judgement by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
addons.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
Survivors hit by Punishment of the Damned suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.
"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

addons.name: Lost Memories Book
addons.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds when affected by Torment.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

addons.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
addons.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
Injured Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds when affected by Torment.
"James... you made me happy." — Maria

addons.name: Scarlet Egg
addons.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +3 seconds.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

addons.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
addons.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
The Auras of all other Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed to you for 6 seconds after sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement.
"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

addons.name: Obsidian Goblet
addons.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while standing on Torment Trails in the environment.
"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

addons.name: Inferno Wires
addons.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
Extends the duration of Main Event by +25 %.

addons.name: Killing Part Chords
addons.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.04 m/s.

addons.name: Memento Blades
addons.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
Increases the Throw rate of Blades by +10 %.

addons.name: Trick Pouch
addons.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
Increases the number of carried Blades by +4.

addons.name: Caged Heart Shoes
addons.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.1 m/s.

addons.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
addons.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +10 %.

addons.name: Lucky Blade
addons.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.3 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.

addons.name: On Target Single
addons.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Tequila Moonrock
addons.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +50 %.

addons.name: Bloody Boa
addons.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.A number of pockets are concealed within it.
Increases the number of carried Blades by +8.

addons.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
addons.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.High sugar and caffeine content.
Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +15 %.

addons.name: Melodious Murder
addons.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
Reduces the Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

addons.name: Ripper Brace
addons.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Waiting For You Watch
addons.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.4 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.
"Don't run awayDon't say we're throughNo way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN'S "Waiting For You"

addons.name: Cut Thru U Single
addons.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
Causes Blades to pierce through the first Survivor they hit and continue travelling.
Any second Survivor hit only receives 0.5 Charges to their Laceration Meter.
"Can't stop this loveThat's tearing your heartWherever you goI will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

addons.name: Diamond Cufflinks
addons.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
The Auras of Survivors one hit away from maximum Laceration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Edge of Revival Album
addons.description:
The Trickster's debut album.The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
Causes Blades to shatter when hitting the environment, adding +0.5 Charges to the Laceration Meter of nearby Survivors.
"Your whisper on meWarm as can beBurning each breathTill I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

addons.name: Trick Blades
addons.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
Causes Blades to ricochet off the environment a total of two times.

addons.name: Death Throes Compilation
addons.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.Terrifying and emotionally raw.
The Auras of Survivors hit during Main Event are revealed to you for 6 seconds.
"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

addons.name: Iridescent Photocard
addons.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
Grants a stack-able +1 % Haste Status Effect, up to a maximum of +7 %, for each consecutive Blade Hit.
This effect is lost when missing a Blade or damaging a Survivor.
"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Metal Spoon
addons.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
Survivors hit by a Special Attack have the volume of their Grunts of Pain increased by +50 % for the next 60 seconds.

addons.name: Plaid Flannel
addons.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
Unlocks the ability to see the Landing zone of the Blink.

addons.name: White Nit Comb
addons.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
Reduces the Lunge duration of Special Attacks by -0.15 seconds, which reduces your Attack range by -50 %.

addons.name: Wooden Horse
addons.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by missed Special Attacks by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Bad Man Keepsake
addons.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Cataontic Boy's" cold dead hand.Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
Survivors hit with a Special Attack have their Auras revealed to you, if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of your location for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
addons.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by Chain Blinks by -65 %.

addons.name: Dark Cincture
addons.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.Taken from Father Campbell's body.
Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Blink Window by +30 %.

addons.name: Dull Bracelet
addons.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -20 %.

addons.name: Pocket Watch
addons.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Anxious Gasp
addons.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl" that The Nurse was fond of.Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
Coming within 1 metre of Survivors while teleporting causes them to scream and reveal their location.
Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

addons.name: Ataxic Respiration
addons.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the asylum patient known as the "Catatonic Boy".Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -7 %.

addons.name: Fragile Wheeze
addons.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
Survivors hit with a Special Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Heavy Panting
addons.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from Harvey Kavanagh, the asylum's "Fat Orderly".Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
Extends the Lunge duration of Special Attacks to 130 %, which increases your Attack range by +30 %.
This effect only applies after the second or third Blink.

addons.name: Spasmodic Breath
addons.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.
Hitting a Survivor with a Special Attack causes the following effects for 60 seconds:
Increases your Movement speed to 4.6 m/s.
Disables your Power.

addons.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient known as the "Bad Man".In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
Hitting Survivors with a Special Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.
"Bad Man's" Last Breath" has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

addons.name: Campbell's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum priest Father Campbell.In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
Reappearing from a fully charged Blink, you automatically Blink at full charge in the direction you are facing.
This requires that you have at least 1 Charge left after the initial Blink.

addons.name: Jenner's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl".In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
After exhausting all of your Blinks, but before succumbing to Fatigue, press the Active Ability button to immediately Blink back to your starting location.
Recharges your Power by +1 Charge.

addons.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh, also known as the "Fat Orderly".In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
When succumbing to Fatigue, all Survivors within 8 metres of your location suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Matchbox
addons.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
Increases your Movement speed to 4.4 m/s for the entire Trial.
Restricts your Power to just 1 Blink.
This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.

addons.name: Torn Bookmark
addons.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +1.
Extends the Power Recharge duration to 130 %.

addons.name: Bent Nail
addons.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Events.
Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.

addons.name: Burning Candle
addons.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Leather Strip
addons.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.15 seconds.

addons.name: Lively Crickets
addons.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +10 %.

addons.name: Flickering Television
addons.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +4 metres.

addons.name: Liquified Gore
addons.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +1 second.

addons.name: Skewered Rat
addons.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.45 seconds.

addons.name: Spoiled Meal
addons.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +2 metres.

addons.name: Wriggling Maggots
addons.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +15 %.

addons.name: Frank's Heart
addons.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +8 metres.
"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead

addons.name: Larry's Blood
addons.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +4 metres.

addons.name: Larry's Remains
addons.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +2 seconds.
"We want the man who did this." — Pinhead

addons.name: Slice of Frank
addons.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect while carrying the Lament Configuration.
"The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." — Frank Cotton

addons.name: Torture Pillar
addons.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -6 seconds.
"This isn't for your eyes." — Pinhead

addons.name: Chatterer's Tooth
addons.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
Grants the ability to see the Aura of the Lament Configuration.
Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt and grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Greasy Black Lens
addons.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to for 6 seconds after hitting them with a Possessed Chain Attack.

addons.name: Impaling Wire
addons.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
Causes a bonus Chain to spawn on Bound Survivors, when they use the environment to break one.

addons.name: Original Pain
addons.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.Such pleasure and pain.
Survivors suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect after breaking from the Possessed Chain.
"No tears, please. It's a waste of good suffering." — Pinhead

addons.name: Engineer's Fang
addons.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
Causes healthy Survivors to become injured when hit with a Possessed Chain Attack, but does not bind them with additional Chains.
This increases the Closing time of the Gateway by +0.25 seconds.
Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when injured Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.
"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead

addons.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
addons.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
Shields the Aura of the Lament Configuration from Survivors who are farther than 24 metres from it outside of a Chain Hunt.
"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead

addons.name: Brian's Intestine
addons.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.It is an appetising sight for zombies.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.25 m/s.

addons.name: Damaged Syringe
addons.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
Increases the Injection time of Vaccines by +5 seconds.

addons.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
addons.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
The Auras of Survivors hit by Zombies are highlighted to you in yellow for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Visitor Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.It also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +2 metres.
Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +10 °.

addons.name: Admin Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +4 metres.
Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +17.5 °.

addons.name: Adrenaline Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after a Survivor uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Marvin's Blood
addons.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.
"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you're not careful." — Marvin Branagh

addons.name: Mikhail's Eye
addons.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.35 m/s.

addons.name: Zombie Heart
addons.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.
"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Licker Tongue
addons.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
Increases the Duration of the Hindered Status Effect when becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.
"It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield

addons.name: Plant 43 Vines
addons.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
Increases the Opening time of Supply Cases by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Serotonin Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, after a Zombie is disintegrated by any means.

addons.name: T-Virus Sample
addons.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +1 point.

addons.name: Tyrant Gore
addons.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.There are signs of severe burns.
Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -7.5 seconds.
Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.

addons.name: Broken Recovery Coin
addons.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.It is broken in half.
Reduces the number of Supply Cases in the environment by -1.
"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
addons.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -5 seconds.
Increases the Movement speed of Zombies by +0.5 m/s.
Once the Exit Gates are powered, disintegrated Zombies respawn in the Exit area.
"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine

addons.name: Jill's Sandwich
addons.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
The Auras of Survivors unlocking a Supply Case are revealed to you for 12 seconds after they succeed.

addons.name: Ne-α Parasite
addons.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after becoming Contaminated, or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.

addons.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
addons.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds after using a Vaccine.
"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Doctor Matt Gorkis

addons.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
addons.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds each time a Generator is completed.
"S.T.A.R.S..." — The Nemesis

addons.name: Healing Salve
addons.description:
A bitterly pungent paste of crushed roots, which were marinated in fish brine for three days and in wine for two.Applied on skin rashes.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Limestone Seal
addons.description:
A cylindrical seal made from porous stone that displays a ritualistic scene with winged deities.
Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Olibanum Incense
addons.description:
Precious resin extracted from Boswellia trees, used during ceremonies for their sweet citrusy fragrance.
The Auras of Survivors cleansing at a Pool of Devotion are revealed to you for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Prayer Tablet Fragment
addons.description:
A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +40 seconds.
Increases the Infection gained while performing Interactions for Survivors by +100 %.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
Vile Purge no longer affects Survivors directly.

addons.name: Blessed Apple
addons.description:
A perfectly ripe fruit to break fast during the purification ceremony.Delicious.
Causes 1 Pool of Devotion to spawn in the Corrupted state.

addons.name: Emetic Potion
addons.description:
A mustard-water based syrup that induces vomiting when consumed.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases the Infection gain from Vile Purge by +30 %.

addons.name: Haematite Seal
addons.description:
A cylindrical seal forged from a metallic hard-stone, engraved with bird-headed beings that stood next to strange machines.Used as a container for sanctified ashes.
Increases the Infection duration on Props hit with Vile Purge by +30 seconds.

addons.name: Potent Tincture
addons.description:
A frothing, murky liquid that permeates the air with an acute aroma of herbs and alcohol.Applied directly on blisters.
Reduces the Cool-down duration of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Prophylactic Amulet
addons.description:
