A fragmented stone tablet with a corrupted incantation originally used to purge illnesses and feelings of general malaise.
Reduces the number of available Pools of Devotion by -2.

addons.name: Ashen Apple
addons.description:
A peeled apple rolled into sanctified ashes.Eating such a fruit warded off the malignantly envious spirits of the deceased.
Causes 1 Pool of Devotion to spawn in the Corrupted state.
Increases the number of available Pools of Devotion by +1.

addons.name: Exorcism Amulet
addons.description:
An obsidian amulet to ward off sickness during exorcism rituals. Inscribed with a prayer to the God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with fierce devotion.
Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Incensed Ointment
addons.description:
A dark waxy paste, laced with cedar sap that diffuses a sweet and earthy aroma.Applied directly on infected skin.
Ingesting Corruption causes all Survivors in your Terror Radius to scream and reveal their locations to you.

addons.name: Infected Emetic
addons.description:
A disgusting syrup of unknown origin.The thick yellow liquid is consumed to induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases the Infection gain from Vile Purge by +40 %.

addons.name: Rubbing Oil
addons.description:
A beaker of rubbing oil with expectorant quality.Exudes the evergreen scent of laurel and rosemary.
Increases the Charge speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +50 %.

addons.name: Devotee's Amulet
addons.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
Increases the duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Severed Toe
addons.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.Radiates with vile power.
Increases the Infection gained while performing Interactions for Survivors by +50 %.

addons.name: Vile Emetic
addons.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.Used to purge evil from the body.
Increases the Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.

addons.name: Worship Tablet
addons.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
Increases the Ingestion speed at Pools of Devotion by +100 %.
Increases your Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by 4.4 %.

addons.name: Black Incense
addons.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
The Auras of vomitting Infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Seal
addons.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
Automatically enter Corrupt Purge whenever a Generator is completed.
Reduces the duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.

addons.name: Jewel Beetle
addons.description:
A beautiful and valuable insect.While difficult to capture, it is worth a pretty penny.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Virulent Bound Score Events.
Reduces the remaining duration of a Bound by -50 % after colliding with a Survivor.

addons.name: R.P.D. Shoulder Walkie
addons.description:
Without the ability to communicate, the cops of Raccoon City are isolated and don’t stand a chance.
Reduces the duration of the first Bound by -20 %.
Increases the duration of the second Bound by +20 %.

addons.name: Unicorn Medallion
addons.description:
An old medallion depicting a majestic unicorn.It was placed in storage for years.
Increases the duration of the first Bound by +20 %.
Reduces the duration of the second Bound by -20 %.

addons.name: Uroboros Tendril
addons.description:
The result of decades of Bio Organic Weapon research.It will not rest until it has swallowed the entire world.
Increases your Movement speed while charging Virulent Bound by +5 %.

addons.name: Bullhorn
addons.description:
The commands screamed into this device riled up some and disoriented others.
Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 30 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.

addons.name: Chalice (Gold)
addons.description:
A chalice of pure gold used to celebrate the summer solstice.
Increases the remaining duration of a Bound by +50 % after colliding with a Survivor.

addons.name: Leather Gloves
addons.description:
Gloves of a cold, calculating schemer.They impart an air of icy professionalism.
Reduces the Power Recharge time by -10 %.

addons.name: Lion Medallion
addons.description:
An old medallion depicting a brave lion.It was made when the Raccoon Police Station was still an art museum.
Increases the Throw distance of Survivors grabbed Mid-Bound by +30 %.

addons.name: Loose Crank
addons.description:
To the person whose only tool is a crank, the whole world looks like a crank-shaped hole.
Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Bound Window by +8 %.

addons.name: Egg (Gold)
addons.description:
A highly coveted foodstuff.The cash worth is second only to its regenerative effects.
Increases the duration of the Chain Bound Window by +50 %.

addons.name: Maiden Medallion
addons.description:
A medallion depicting a beautiful maiden.Its purpose was unknown for many years.
Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.

addons.name: Portable Safe
addons.description:
A small container that requires a complicated combination to unlock.
Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed when injured using Virulent Bound.

addons.name: Red Herb
addons.description:
Acts as a reagent that strengthens the effect of that with which it is combined.
Increases the Healing time of the First Aid Spray by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Video Conference Device
addons.description:
Many intricate conspiracies were orchestrated on devices just like this one.
Reduces the Infection timer of Survivors by -30 %.

addons.name: Dark Sunglasses
addons.description:
Glasses enhanced with AR that grant the wearer an invaluable advantage on the battlefield.
Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds whenever a Survivors reaches Critical Infection.

addons.name: Green Herb
addons.description:
A common plant, usually known for its restorative properties.
Increases the Infection applied when colliding with Survivors Mid-Bound by +30 %.

addons.name: Helicopter Stick
addons.description:
Debris from a helicopter crash.Few jobs are more dangerous than a helicopter pilot's when Wesker is involved.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 8 seconds after using a First Aid Spray.

addons.name: Uroboros Virus
addons.description:
For some, the strength and resistance was worth the trade-off.
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.
"The balance of the world is changing… and you're completely oblivious to it." — Ricardo Irving

addons.name: Iridescent Uroboros Vial
addons.description:
The perfect bio-weapon.Decades of research have led to this.
Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Uroboros.
Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 30 seconds when they reach Critical Infection.
"The entire world will be infected. A new Genesis is at hand and I will be the creator!" — Albert Wesker

addons.name: Lab Photo
addons.description:
Wesker was as much a researcher as he was a guinea pig for Umbrella's bio-weapons.
Grants the ability to break Breakable Walls or Pallets when colliding with them Mid-Bound.
You can no longer vault over Pallets using Virulent Bound.
"Only a handful of humans truly matter. Everyone else is just so much chaff. So now I have to separate this chaff from the wheat." — Albert Wesker

addons.name: "The Beast" - Soot
addons.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the Realm of Fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Your Terror Radius is no longer suppressed when Cloaked.
Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Stalking and Surprise Attack Score Events.

addons.name: "The Ghost" - Soot
addons.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the Spirit World, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Your Terror Radius and Red Stain are suppressed for another 6 seconds after uncloaking.

addons.name: "The Hound" - Soot
addons.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
When Cloaked, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.

addons.name: "The Serpent" - Soot
addons.description:
The Laokeye symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the Bell.
Breaking Breakable Walls or Pallets by any means, or performing the Damage Generator action on incomplete Generators, will cause you to automatically uncloak.

addons.name: "Blind Warrior" - Mud
addons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: "Blink" - Mud
addons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces the Cloaking time by -40 %.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Mud
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Reduces the Uncloaking time by -8 %.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - Mud
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.
Increases your Movement Speed by +5 % when Cloaked.

addons.name: Bone Clapper
addons.description:
A Bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone.Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.
Survivors are unable to discern the distance and direction of the Wailing Bell.

addons.name: "Blind Warrior" - White
addons.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Survivors hit with a Surprise Attack suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.

addons.name: "Blink" - White
addons.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces the Cloaking time by -60 %.

addons.name: "Shadow Dance" - White
addons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +40 % while Cloaked.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - White
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Reduces the Uncloaking time by -10 %.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - White
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in white ink on the body of the Bell.
Increases your Movement Speed by +7 % when Cloaked.

addons.name: "All Seeing" - Blood
addons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in your Aura-reading ability:
The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you within 8 metres of your location when Cloaked.

addons.name: "Shadow Dance" - Blood
addons.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +60 % when Cloaked.

addons.name: "Swift Hunt" - Blood
addons.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing a rapid descent on a prey, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Reduces the Uncloaking time by -12 %.

addons.name: "Windstorm" - Blood
addons.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.
Increases your Movement Speed by +9 % when Cloaked.

addons.name: "All Seeing" - Spirit
addons.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing the Entity watching over us, ominously glows on the head of the Bell.
Unlocks hidden potential in your Aura-reading ability:
Reveals the Repair progression of Generators via the intensity of their Aura when Cloaked.

addons.name: Coxcombed Clapper
addons.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound.A malevolent Aura emanates from it.
Silences the Wailing Bell.

addons.name: Gifted Bamboo Comb
addons.description:
A narrow tooth bamboo comb to gently untangle dishevelled hair.
Increases the Charge speed of Yamaoka's Haunting by +15 %.

addons.name: Origami Crane
addons.description:
One of the one thousand Orizuru for your wish to come true.
Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 %.

addons.name: Shiawase Amulet
addons.description:
A talisman that makes one happy and enthusiastic.
Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Zōri
addons.description:
A comfortable pair of flat sandals that can easily be slipped on and off.
Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +5 %.

addons.name: Juniper Bonsai
addons.description:
Dark blue-green foliage bonsai tree.Once the symbol of Yamaoka family tradition.
Reduces the Cool-down of your Passive Phasing by -1 second.
Increases the Duration of your Passive Phasing by +50 %.

addons.name: Kaiun Talisman
addons.description:
A talisman to get luck on your side.
Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +1 second.

addons.name: Muddy Sports Day Cap
addons.description:
A muddy sport cap with a High School logo.Identified with a sewn name tag to "Rin".
Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +10 %.

addons.name: Rin's Broken Watch
addons.description:
A wristwatch with a shattered glass.The name "Rin" is scribbled on the wristband.
Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +30 %.

addons.name: White Hair Ribbon
addons.description:
A silken bow to tame wild hair.
Increases the Charge speed of Yamaoka's Haunting by +20 %.

addons.name: Katana Tsuba
addons.description:
The hand-guard of an ancestral blade.Crafted for the Yamaoka family.
Extends the Invisibility duration while reappearing from a Phase-Walk by +0.2 seconds.
Increases your Movement speed while reappearing from a Phase-Walk by +5 %.

addons.name: Mother's Glasses
addons.description:
A pair of glasses belonging to a loving mother afflicted with a chronic disease.
Survivors coming within 2 metres of the Husk during a Phase-Walk triggers Killer Instinct.

addons.name: Rusty Flute
addons.description:
A rusty transverse flute with a haunting sound.
Increases the Recharge rate of Yamaoka's Haunting by +40 %.

addons.name: Senko Hanabi
addons.description:
Thin sparklers that light up summer nights and display the beauty of ephemeral moments in life.
Causes the Husk to explode after ending a Phase-Walk, blocking all Vault locations within 4 metres of its location for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Uchiwa
addons.description:
A handheld fan with a koi motif to create a nice breeze on a hot summer day.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after being stunned by a Pallet.

addons.name: Dried Cherry Blossom
addons.description:
A crumbling, dried cherry flower.Once the symbol of mortality.
Coming within 3 metres of a Survivor during a Phase-Walk triggers Killer Instinct.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible to you during a Phase-Walk.

addons.name: Furin
addons.description:
A warm summer breeze chimes the little bell hanging from the balcony ceiling.
Causes all Survivors to hear the audio cue of the Phase-Walk.

addons.name: Wakizashi Saya
addons.description:
The scabbard of an ancestral blade.Once crafted for the Yamaoka family.
Press the Active Ability button during a Phase-Walk to instantly reappear at the location of the Husk.

addons.name: Yakuyoke Amulet
addons.description:
A powerful talisman to protect your endeavours from being hindered by suspicious circumstances.
Increases the Duration of a Phase-Walk by +3.5 seconds.
Reduces your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by -15 %.

addons.name: Kintsugi Teacup
addons.description:
A cup mended and lacquered with powdered gold.Both the breakage and repair are part the cup.
Instantly recharges Yamaoka's Haunting after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.

addons.name: Mother-Daughter Ring
addons.description:
A silver ring engraved with "for my precious daughter".
Increases your Movement speed during a Phase-Walk by +25 %.
Scratch Marks are no longer visible to you during a Phase-Walk.

addons.name: Blackened Toenail
addons.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.4 m/s.
"If a father sacrifices not for his children, then who does he father?" — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:12

addons.name: Cracked Sakazuki
addons.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.It never made it through the night before being damaged.
Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Paper Lantern
addons.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
Increases the Floating speed of Blood Orbs towards you when in Absorption Mode by +4 m/s.

addons.name: Rotting Rope
addons.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +2 metres.
"Though Death is focused, he has been known to blink." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:5

addons.name: Bloody Sash
addons.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor".Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
Increases your Movement speed while in Absorption Mode by 0.7 m/s.

addons.name: Child's Wooden Sword
addons.description:
Akito's practice sword.The child had little use for it after his injury.
Increases the Aura-reading range on Blood Orbs in the environment by +3 metres.

addons.name: Chipped Saihai
addons.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.

addons.name: Ink Lion
addons.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
Reduces the Transition time into Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Transition time out of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Polished Maedate
addons.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.1 c/s.

addons.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
addons.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.

addons.name: Scalped Topknot
addons.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
Reduces the Charge time of Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Shattered Wakizashi
addons.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
Increases the passive Charge rate of Blood Fury by +0.2 c/s.

addons.name: Wooden Oni Mask
addons.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +14 %.
Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.
"It is no coincidence that man is so familiar with demons." — Renjiro's Doctrine 3:8

addons.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
addons.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.

addons.name: Akito's Crutch
addons.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
Increases your Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1 m/s.

addons.name: Lion Fang
addons.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
Increases the duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Splintered Hull
addons.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
Increases the Spawn frequency of Blood Orbs from injured Survivors by +33 %.
Increases the number of Blood Orbs spawned when Survivors perform specific interactions by +1.
"To plan subterfuge, begin with a counsel of none." — Renjiro's Doctrine 7:9

addons.name: Tear-Soaked Tenugui
addons.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
Reduces the Power Gauge penalty for downing Survivors during Blood Fury by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Family Crest
addons.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
Causes Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you after hitting the ground with a missed Demon Strike.
"Know who you are so you may shield your heart." — Renjiro's Doctrine 11:2

addons.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
addons.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
The Auras of Survivors coming into contact with a Blood Orb are revealed to you for 2 seconds.
This effect stacks per Blood Orb.
Causes Blood Orbs to be visible to Survivors and to be absorbed when they come into contact with them.
"When all else spills out, cling only to your honour." — Renjiro's Doctrine 14:12

addons.name: Buck Shot
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +1.5 to 2.5 seconds.
Increases the duration of the Deafened Status Effect by +0 to 2 seconds.

addons.name: Flash Powder
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +10 %.

addons.name: Medium Fuse
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation delay by +0.75 seconds.

addons.name: Gun Powder
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Blindness duration by +20 %.

addons.name: Long Fuse
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation delay by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Magnesium Powder
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation radius by +2.5 metres.

addons.name: Black Powder
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the Detonation radius by +5 metres.

addons.name: Large Pack
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the Game, but exists in code.) 
Unknown Description.

Increases the number of available Uses by +2.

addons.name: Battery
addons.description:
A standard battery of unknown brand.
Increases the Battery life by +2 seconds.
"Another nearly empty battery."

addons.name: Leather Grip
addons.description:
A leather strip wrapped around the Flashlight for more grip.
Increases the Aim accuracy by +20 %.
"Too many have fallen due to sweaty hands."

addons.name: Power Bulb
addons.description:
A tiny Flashlight bulb that packs more wattage for a brighter, more powerful light beam.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +20 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +10 %.
"Even the most powerful light cannot pierce through The Black Fog's darkness."

addons.name: Wide Lens
addons.description:
A thin wide lens in perfect condition.Designed to spread the Flashlight beam at the cost of reducing its range of effectiveness.
Increases the width of the Beam by +25 %.
Reduces the reach of the Beam by -25 %.

addons.name: Focus Lens
addons.description:
A thick glass lens that focuses the Flashlight beam to increase its intensity.
Increases the reach of the Beam by +25 %.
Increases the brightness by +20 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +10 %.
Reduces the width of the Beam by -15 %.

addons.name: Heavy Duty Battery
addons.description:
A battery marked as "industrial strength".
Increases the Battery life by +4 seconds.
"A battery advertised as lasting 8 hours lasts only a couple of seconds in The Black Fog."

addons.name: Low Amp Filament
addons.description:
A filament bulb designed to extend a Flashlight battery's life.
Reduces the Battery Depletion rate by -24 %.

addons.name: Rubber Grip
addons.description:
A rubber grip specifically fitting Flashlights for more grip.
Increases the Aim accuracy by +40 %.

addons.name: TIR Optic
addons.description:
A lens and reflector combo which can magnify a Flashlight's beam.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +30 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +15 %.
"Let the light burn them out of their dark shroud."

addons.name: Intense Halogen
addons.description:
A chemical bulb that generates an intensely clear light.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +40 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +20 %.

addons.name: Long Life Battery
addons.description:
A recent model of battery that lasts longer.
Extends the Battery life by +6 seconds.

addons.name: High-End Sapphire Lens
addons.description:
A wide lens made of unscratchable sapphire that optimises the power and range of the light beam.
Increases the reach of the Beam by +25 %.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +30 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +15 %.
Reduces the width of the Beam by -25 %.

addons.name: Odd Bulb
addons.description:
A heavy and completely opaque bulb of unknown origin which emits a faint light even when turned off.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +50 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +25 %.
Increases the Battery Depletion rate by +14 %.

addons.name: Broken Bulb
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE (This Unlockable no longer spawns in the Bloodweb and can no longer be used in Trials, being greyed-out in the inventory.It may temporarily return during an Event.) 
A damaged bulb that causes a spooky flickering effect.

Causes the Flashlight to flicker.
Increases the brightness of the Beam by +15 %.
Increases the duration of a successful Blind by +30 %.
Increases the spookiness.
The Broken Bulb is only available during Halloween Events.

addons.name: Prayer Rope
addons.description:
Tightly knitted rope used in praying rituals.
Increases the Use time of Keys by 10 seconds.
"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in the Fog."

addons.name: Eroded Token
addons.description:
A heavily worn out token made of brass.If an inscription or drawing was once engraved in it, it has today completely disappeared.
The Auras of other Survivors within 24 metres are revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Eroded Token does not stack with Gold Token.

addons.name: Prayer Beads
addons.description:
A chain of matte beads of various sizes used in praying ritual.
Increases the Use time of Keys by 15 seconds.

addons.name: Scratched Pearl
addons.description:
A porous and scratched white pearl.A minuscule jump ring allows the pearl to be attached to the key.
Increases the Aura-reading range of Keys by +12 metres.
"Pray all you want, your words are getting lost somewhere up there, in the Fog."

addons.name: Gold Token
addons.description:
A gold token with a dull appearance.Both faces are smooth and void of any inscriptions.
The Auras of other Survivors within 48 metres are revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Gold Token does not stack with Eroded Token.

addons.name: Blood Amber
addons.description:
A blood-red amber striped with black veins.The amber is warm to the touch.
The Aura of the Killer within 32 metres is revealed to you while Mind Channel is active.
Increases the Depletion rate by +100 %.

addons.name: Milky Glass
addons.description:
This opaque piece of glass emits a dull vibrating noise.Channels the Black Fog's energy.
Using a Key to open the closed Hatch consumes this Add-on instead.

addons.name: Unique Wedding Ring
addons.description:
An engraved wedding ring that emerged from the Fog and resonates with an indescribable and incomprehensible energy.
The Aura of the Obsession is automatically revealed to you at all times.
This does not require using the Mind Channel ability.
Reduces the Odds of becoming the initial Obsession of the Killer by -100 %.

addons.name: Weaved Ring
addons.description:
A mundane key ring in appearance with an unusual bluish dark sheen.The ring binds the Key to its user, preventing loss even in the darkest of times.
Causes this Add-on to be consumed upon death instead of the Key.

addons.name: Map Addendum
addons.description:
A fragmented piece of a thick fibrous material.A partial and faded map is drawn on it which by itself is useless.
Increases the Durability of the Map by +5 seconds.

addons.name: Glass Bead
addons.description:
A strange bead circled with gold that can be used to magnify the map and mark a specific position.The bead emits an energy which can be felt and seen by Survivors.
Press the Secondary Action button while using the Map to use the Glass Bead to place a Pillar of Light at your current location that can be seen by all Survivors.

addons.name: Red Twine
addons.description:
A bristly and rough piece of twine of a deep red colour.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track Killer Belongings.

addons.name: Retardant Jelly
addons.description:
A slimy, translucent substance with a ghastly lavender shade.This jelly from unknown origin is highly resistant to heat.
Reduces the Depletion rate by -20 %.

addons.name: Unusual Stamp
addons.description:
A wooden stamp with a cross-hatched rubber pad used to mark documents.It is unclear as to how or by whom this stamp was originally used.
Increases the Object Tracking range by +8 metres.

addons.name: Yellow Wire
addons.description:
A small electrical wire.Both ends are heavily damaged like it has been forcefully torn out of its intended location.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track the Exit Gate Switches

addons.name: Black Silk Cord
addons.description:
A smooth black cord with a soft appearance.Can be tied around the Map to enhance its Aura-reading ability.
Unlocks the ability to track the Hatch.

addons.name: Odd Stamp
addons.description:
A stamp carved out of sturdy blonde wood.The text found at the base is incomprehensible: "kw'zvre'od".
Increases the Object Tracking range by +12 metres.

addons.name: Crystal Bead
addons.description:
An intricate set of lenses wrapped up in an astonishingly complex apparatus.The gears controlling the lenses' focus move by themselves as to focus on something invisible to humans.
Reveals the tracked Auras to all Survivors.

addons.name: Bandages
addons.description:
A pack of bandages usually found in First Aid Kits.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +8 Charges.

addons.name: Butterfly Tape
addons.description:
Medical quality tape used to close small wounds.
Increases the Healing speed by +5 %.

addons.name: Rubber Gloves
addons.description:
Disposable medical gloves to avoid cross-contamination.
Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

addons.name: Medical Scissors
addons.description:
Scissors designed to easily cut through textiles.
Increases the Healing speed by +10 %.

addons.name: Needle & Thread
addons.description:
Not exactly a medical device.However, it can be used to quickly and painfully close up a wound.
Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.
Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +5 %.

addons.name: Self Adherent Wrap
addons.description:
A pack of bandages that stick to themselves without the need of clips for a faster patch-up that requires less readjustments.
Increases the Healing speed by +5 %.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +8 Charges.

addons.name: Sponge
addons.description:
A mundane sponge used to soak up extra blood, providing easier access to wounds.
Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +20 %.

addons.name: Gauze Roll
addons.description:
A sterile gauze used for a variety of wounds.Part of a total wound care system.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +10 Charges.

addons.name: Surgical Suture
addons.description:
A medical device used to close and hold body tissue.Even though it is very effective, the surgical suture is challenging to use.
Increases the Odds of triggering Healing Skill Checks by +15 %.
Increases the Progression bonus for succeeding at Great Healing Skill Checks by +10 %.

addons.name: Abdominal Dressing
addons.description:
A highly absorbent pad that prevents bodily fluid leakage when applied to large abdominal wounds.
Increases the Healing speed of Med-Kits by +15 %.

addons.name: Styptic Agent
addons.description:
A white powder with coagulant properties.Apply the agent to a wound to stop it from haemorrhaging.
Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Styptic Agent to grant the Endurance Status Effect for 5 seconds.
Endurance is cancelled prematurely when performing a Conspicuous Action.
Styptic Agent consumes the Med-Kit on use.

addons.name: Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe
addons.description:
An anti-haemorrhagic substance that stops the bleeding in a matter of seconds.
Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe to automatically heal the affected Survivor for 1 Health State over the next 16 seconds.
Healing Speed modifiers affect the Healing time.
Taking damage or being picked up by the Killer cancels the Healing effect.
Anti-Haemorrhagic Syringe consumes the Med-Kit on use.

addons.name: Gel Dressings
addons.description:
A pack of gel forming pads used to patch up heavily exuding wounds.
Increases the available Healing Charges by +16 Charges.

addons.name: Refined Serum
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE (This Unlockable no longer spawns in the Bloodweb and can no longer be used in Trials, being greyed-out in the inventory.It may temporarily return during an Event.) 
A refined version of the Putrid Serum that is mostly safe for human consumption.Mostly.

Press the Secondary Action button while healing yourself or another Survivor with a Med-Kit to use the Refined Serum to boost the Movement speed of the affected Survivor by +5 % for 16 seconds.
Creates a Blight trail behind the affected Survivor.
Refined Serum consumes the Med-Kit on use.

The Refined Serum is only available during Halloween Events.

addons.name: Clean Rag
addons.description:
A mundane rag.
Suspiciously clean.
Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

addons.name: Instructions
addons.description:
Someone quickly painted what seems to be repair instructions on this piece of bark.
Suppresses all normal Skill Checks that are usually triggered while repairing a Generator.

addons.name: Scraps
addons.description:
Springs, screws and gears.
Mostly unusable junk.
Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +8 Charges.

addons.name: Cutting Wire
addons.description:
A rudimentary cutting tool made from a jagged metal wire and two wooden handles.
Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +15 %.

addons.name: Protective Gloves
addons.description:
Thick gloves, which reduce manual dexterity but protect hands from injury.
Suppresses the Loud Noise Notification to the Killer that is usually triggered after sabotaging a Hook.

addons.name: Socket Swivels
addons.description:
Swivels provide bend and flexibility for bolts that are out of reach, deep within mechanical devices.
Increases the Repair speed of the Toolbox by +30 %.

addons.name: Spring Clamp
addons.description:
Useful tool to clamp hoses or hold wires in place and prevent damage or injury.
Reduces the range at which your Generator-Repair noises can be heard by -8 metres.

addons.name: Wire Spool
addons.description:
A portable but heavy spool of copper wire.
Increases the Capacity of the Toolbox by +12 Charges.

addons.name: Grip Wrench
addons.description:
An adjustable wrench with a tough grip.
Essential in any Toolbox.
Increases the Auto-Repair timer for sabotaged Hooks by +15 seconds.

addons.name: Hacksaw
addons.description:
A small hand saw mounted with a metal cutting blade.
Increases the Sabotage speed of the Toolbox by +20 %.

addons.name: Brand New Part
addons.description:
This intricate mechanical part feels oddly out of place.It is clean and shiny as if straight out of the factory.
Replaces the Toolbox Repair prompt with an Install Brand New Part prompt instead:
Installing the Brand New Part triggers 1 difficult Skill Check.
Reduces that Generator's Repair requirement permanently by -10 Charges after succeeding the Skill Check.

Brand New Part is consumed on use.
